name: Mythical Mediator
description:
The gods are always fighting and bickering about one thing or another in this Full-Motion-Video Game! One of these days one of them is going to snap and bring about the end of times, so it's your job as the fleet-footed Messenger For The Gods to keep them all happy and make sure that at least it isn't today.

Build cities, trees, monuments, and all sorts of things for the gods! Do place them carefully - the gods care deeply where their monuments are relative to each-other's. Place carefully and many gods can become happy at once, place carelessly and they might throw an apocalyptic fit!

See if you can beat the Hardcore build, the true test of divine mediation! You'll need to juggle the requests of the 5 competing gods, strategize exactly who you interact with and when, and plan ahead to maximize your luck and advantage. 

Good luck! And remember, if you get confused, press 'Escape' to view gameplay tips at any time!
